title: Mathematics Competency Enhancement Program Utilizing Multimodal Digital Classroom Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Concepts and Experience with Digital Tools
context.additional_context: Flexible learning schedule for working adult learners, conducting formative assessment experiments using diverse digital tools in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can express and submit mathematical problem-solving processes in at least three modalities using multimodal digital assessment tools
Learners systematically document project outcomes in digital portfolios and conduct self-assessments two or more times
Learners collaboratively improve mathematical problem-solving strategies three or more times through a peer feedback system

resources: Multimodal Assessment Tool (Screencasting, Digital Drawing, etc.)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
